summary: Stops NPCs from standing in the bin of leeks while they are browsing.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This is my first mod. All it does is tackle one of many tiny glitches that has bothered me every time that I've played Skyrim, and something I haven't seen taken care of with any of the Unofficial Patches. Simply put, it makes Carlotta's Produce Stall in the Whiterun Market more aesthetically pleasing! [/size]
[b]
[size=5][u]What it does:
[/u][/size][/b]
[size=3]1. Raises Carlotta's leeks and tomato display bins off of the ground to sit on top of a couple crates. [/size]
[size=3]2. Moves the NPC browsing marker back a little bit so that NPCs browse her vegetables without trying to climb into the bin.[/size]


[b][size=5]INSTALLATION[/size][/b][size=3] (If you didn't download with NMM)
[/size]
[size=3]1. Copy the file "Carlotta_Stall_Fix.esp" from the unzipped folder that you download from here.[/size]
[size=3]2. Paste it in your Data folder located under Skyrim/Data wherever you have Skyrim installed.[/size]
[size=3]3. If you have NMM but you downloaded and installed manually make sure you activate the check mark in NMM under the "Plugins" tab.[/size]
[size=3](This is the same process for many mods that only contain an .esp file)[/size]

[size=3]This little mod should work with any other Whiterun mods that don't change the area directly in front of Carlotta's Market Stall in Whiterun. [/size]
author: KevinZiggy
